about_the_game:
ABOUT THE CONTENTS

You can access the ''Glamorous Bodied Twenty-Something Housewife' story from 'Obedient Women'.

Glamorous Bodied Twenty-Something Housewife

HEROINE:
Harumi Fushimachi
She's a calm and faithful lady who dutifully takes care of her husband.

SYNOPSIS (Twenty-Something Housewife)

The main character is an office worker in his twenties. He's smart and confident with an outgoing personality.
His boss likes him.
One night, his boss drinks too much and stays over. Then, our character's bad luck begins.
His boss has the hots for his attractive wife.
He seductively compliments her.
He knows that his boss likes his wife and later invites him to experience her cuisine.
After that, his boss starts to come over regularly.
On a day off, he needs to fill-in for his boss at a golf event, but it is simply the erotic strategy of his boss.
While he's out playing golf, his boss visits his house.
His wife is cautious of her husband's boss and tries to ask him to leave the house.
However, he implies that her husband's successful career could be in jeopardy. She can't refuse as he starts to touch her and her crotch gets wet.
Then, he forcefully has sex with her.
In the end, she reaches maximum climax.
She must have sex with him whenever her husband goes on a business trip or plays golf.
Mindful of her husband's career, she can't say no...as she gets more and more excited.
She obediently accommodates his demands to have sex with her.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game product contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
It contains images and descriptions of adult nudity and sexual behavior.
The contents of this game are inappropriate for minors and perhaps not suitable for the workplace.
All characters involved in any sexual situations in this game are intended to be over 18 years of age.
Some non-consensual sexual activity is included.
This is a work of fiction.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 128MB, Resolution 720p
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card and latest driver
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 512MB, Resolution 1080p
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card and latest driver

short_description: A young, gorgeous housewife suddenly finds herself enmeshed in unforeseen pleasure with her husband's boss.
